messages.subject: Re: welcome JJ
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome JJ to our group. Tell us why do you like so much Japanese history? What impressed you in Japan? friendly, Amphipolis ... I ... have ... I
messages.messageBody:
Welcome JJ to our group.
Tell us why do you like so much Japanese history?
What impressed you in Japan?

friendly,
Amphipolis
________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Mon, 22 Jul 2002 16:34:02 -0500
> From: "JJ" <DarkJJ@...>
> Subject: Greetings All
>
> Konnichiwa,
>
> I have just joined this list and wished to express my greetings to all
> of you. I am very interested in Japanese history and have visited Japan
> twice. I know a little history, but I want to learn more, much much more.
I
> am hoping that being a member of this list will broaden my knowledge. I
have
> visited the Samurai Archives web page very frequently in the past and have
> just stumbled onto this e-mail group. I hope to meet new people with whom
I
> can talk about Japan and it's history.
>
> Compassion go with you,
>
> ~Sasaki Kojiro~
> (AKA: JJ)
>
>
>
